channel.title: Favorite Half Life Series moments/chapters
channel.description:
I remember this from the *deceased* forum, and I really enjoyed people's responses.
This is a thread about your favorite HL moments, from HL to HL2 ep2. It doesn't matter what it is because it's your opinion.
Mine are as follows:
Half Life-Riding the Tram in to Black Mesa. At that time I couldn't believe how awesome the graphics looked! HL Blue Shift-Seeing Gordon go by in the Tram in the beginning-it was like I was star-struck :smiley: HL OP4-Defeating the Pit Worm, the first time it took me forever to beat him! HL2-When I first saw how real the water looked in Route Kanal, I was astonished at how the graphics improved ep 1-The train ride out of the city was very cool to watch ep 2-The ant lion fight with the Vorts and the two rebels (I forget their names!) I loved having an ant lion fly over head and blast it with the shotgun!
[COLOR='Red']raw_bean EDIT: Merged with more recent threads asking for your favourite chapter from the Half-Life series.

item.title: Favorite Half Life Series moments/chapters

item.description:
Uplink: “maybe he can do it.”
HL1: shooting my first scientist and killing Barney with the crowbar.
HL2:When a Zombie screamed, “YABBA MY ICING!” and killing the crazy guy who paces at the beginning with impulse 101.

item.title: Favorite Half Life Series moments/chapters
item.dc:creator: Jonny_Nibbz
item.description:
Favorite Half-Life moment? That would have to be when I went to seal the Silo 2 Doors. It surprised me when the rebel goes “Hey! We could use an extra- AGH! RUN! RUN FOR YOUR LIFE!” when the hunter surprise attacks him. I almost tried to run under the door, then realized I couldn’t. Then when you see the Advisor at the top.

Read full topic

item.title: Favorite Half Life Series moments/chapters
item.dc:creator: higgsboson
item.description:
HL1: Office complex, when it creeped me out so much I could only play like 10 minutes a day.

Opposing Force: The Biodome Complex, seeing all the stuff that happens after Freeman leaves Earth. Also, Crush Depth, the feeling of claustrophobia and the entire level design was great.

HL2: The Airboat: when you were free to go to so many places, and the awesome graphics. I loved when you went into that tower thing to open a gate, and you had so many options to kill the Combine. I loved when the metro-cops die and they make that beeping sound with the woman voice announcing their death.

EP1: The entire initial Citadel part, I loved how it was falling apart and it reminded me a lot of HL1 when Black Mesa was falling apart. I love places getting destroyed while you’re in, with half-working equipment and explosions.

EP2: The amazing graphics everywhere, especially the realistic goo in the Ant Lion nests.

Read full topic

The first part of E2 and your in the building and alyx is outside. Lights turn on and you see the highlight of a hunter, and a dead rebel hanging by his foot. You keep going until alyx gets attacked, and you freak out.

item.description:
MarshmallowRadiation:

Water Hazard. I LOVE Water Hazard.
But I’m kinda torn between this and:
The Fast zombie jumping on the ep2 car
Eli’s death (that was just so… depressing)

Oh shit! I forgot about that fast zombie jumping onto the car. The was totally epic. But I am torn as well since Eli died at the end

item.title: Favorite Half Life Series moments/chapters
item.dc:creator: MarshmallowRadiation
item.description:
Water Hazard. I LOVE Water Hazard.
But I’m kinda torn between this and:
The Barn Advisor
The Fast zombie jumping on the ep2 car
Gman’s ep2 speech
Eli’s death (that was just so… depressing)

EDIT: So, yeah. I liked ep2 the best, as you can probably tell.

item.title: Favorite Half Life Series moments/chapters
item.dc:creator: HuDaFuK
item.description:
I loved the whole Surface Tension chapter in the original Half-Life, that section was crazy and had some kick-ass shootouts. But I think the last bit in City 17 from Half-Life 2 just beat it, when you were in the huge building full of Combine and surrounded by Striders blasting the hell out of it. It was amazing.

Read full topic

item.title: Favorite Half Life Series moments/chapters
item.dc:creator: Pyroclase
item.description:
geekofalltrades:

My favorite moment is the vista down in the antlion caves in Ep2, at the point where the vort picks up the extract. I’m a sucker for atmosphere.

:meh:

…Lucky. I have a severe problem with cubemaps that forces me to skip this vortal coil.
